attributes.action: consider allowing Online Voting for Elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It will be more Eco-Friendly if we can get more people to vote online, than sending out the postcard reminders all the time.  Inaddition more young people and housebound people may be more likely to vote.  Surely Online Voting is the way to go.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
